unittitle_ssm: Dr. Harry M. Spodak Flatbush photograph collection
abstract_ssm: Three photographs, dated circa 1890 to 1899. The photographs show Flatbush Avenue, the Flatbush Dutch Reformed Church, and Erasmus Hall High School, all located in the Flatbush neighborhood of Brooklyn. The image of Flatbush Avenue was taken by F.A. Lippold; no other photographers are identified.
corpname_ssm: Flatbush Dutch Reformed Church (Flatbush, New York, N.Y.)
collection_ssm: Dr. Harry M. Spodak Flatbush photograph collection
